projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Speech Enhancement using Deep Learning
projects.bodyText:
- Implemented a monaural self-supervised time-frequency domain speech enhancement model in time domain.
 - Changed architecture of original T-F domain model and implemented necessary loss functions to adapt it to directly work with waveform and improve enhancement quality.
 - Developed with Pytorch and Matlab

projects.title: Sorting Algorithms Visualizer
projects.bodyText:
- Created a web-page that allows users to visualize different sorting algorithms with adjustable array sizes and random array values.
 - Implemented a feature that enables users to change visualization speed in real-time.
 - Developed with HTML, CSS, JavaScript.
